newUsers.title: Welcome to our server!
newUsers.description: I hope you have a great time here and make lots of new friends!
newUsers.value: Make sure you are aware of the server rules:

info: Shows a list of all commands
admin: Send something on behalf of the bot
Set auto role for new members
View the list of auto roles
Remove auto role from the list
moder: Clears the chat for a certain number of messages
util: Translates text, determines the language of the text for translation independently
